page.title: 19Local issues
page.content: We went out on to Market Street interviewing people about Clay Cross. We interviewed{33 people. 20%}have lived here for from{10 to 20 years. Another{50%}have lived here{over 20 years. People in Clay Cross like the{shops. They especially like the{market}which is on Saturdays in the Kwik Save car park. There are about{30 stalls}on the market. There are{food, clothes,}an {electrical}and many other stalls, including a{50p stall.}The new{Leisure {Centre}is popular.Those we interviewed like the way that people go to old peoples' houses to help. There is a {great community spirit in Clay Cross. Most people would like to see more {road crossings}especially on busy {Market Street.}There should be more for the young to do. The dog muck should be cleared off the pavement.
